tasks.stimulus:
This is an item bundle with one item. The item bundle has a stimulus at the top level, the item does not have an internal stimulus.

My Text Passage Caption
Text Passage Group NumberText Passage
1I grew up with buckets, shovels, and nets waiting by the back door; hip-waders hanging in the closet; tide table charts covering the refrigerator door; and a microscope was sitting on the kitchen table.
2Having studied, my mother is a marine biologist. Our household might have been described as uncooperative. Our meals weren’t always served in the expected order of breakfast, lunch, and supper. Everything was subservient to the disposal of the tides. When the tide was low, Mom could be found down on the mudflats. When the tide was high, she would be standing on the inlet bridge with her plankton net.
3I have great respect for my mother. I learned early that the moon affected the tides.
4Mom was always waiting for a full or new moon, when low tide would be lower than average and high tide higher than average. The moon being aligned with Earth and the sun when full or new, so its gravity combines with the sun’s gravity to create an even stronger gravitational pull.
5I knew that it took about eight hours for the tides to change from high to low, sixteen hours for a complete cycle of tides. 9 I didn’t have to wait to learn these things in school. In our house they were everyday knowledge.
5I knew that it took about eight hours for the tides to change from high to low, sixteen hours for a complete cycle of tides. 9 I didn’t have to wait to learn these things in school. In our house they were everyday knowledge.

assessmentItem.stylesheets: .lsi-table-text-group tr th:first-child {width: 5%; font-weight: bold; vertical-align: top;} .lsi-table-text-group tr td {vertical-align: top; padding: 1px 10px;} .lsi-table-text-group span.text-group {display: inline-block; padding: 1px 10px; border-radius: 50%; -moz-border-radius: 50%;}

interactions.prompt: Which value/s of \(x\) satisfies your equation?
